section.heading: The FlyMine Data Model
section.item: The FlyMine database is based upon an object model. The object model has been created by merging existing ontologies and standards including the Sequence Ontology, MAGE, and PSI (blah blah). Additional FlyMine specific classes help link the ontologies and provide classes relating to the evidence for a particular piece of data (needs work!!). To get the most out of querying FlyMine it is useful to understand a bit about the underlying data model. First of all it is useful to understand the concepts of classes, objects and fields.
